name: 弾幕の器
description:
A barrage game in a different direction from Touhou. Destroy all the turrets of enemy ships.

Each turret makes a different attack, so the point of capture is which turret to destroy. Observe the barrage and destroy it from the high-threat turret!

Destroy 30 types of enemy ships to release "Musou Random Battle"! .. Let's overwhelm the enemy ship suffered by Musou armament and change your mood!

●●●●●

The sequel "Vessel of the Bullet 2" has been released!

If you are a beginner, we recommend starting from Easy mode of "Bullet 2" which has Easy mode.

●●●●●
